articles.description: Jadon Sancho, Marcus Thuram and Westo McKennie made tributes to George Floyd over the weekend, with their actions to be examined by the DFB.
articles.content:
The DFB will examine tributes Jadon Sancho, Marcus Thuram and Weston McKennie made to George Floyd during Bundesliga matches at the weekend.
After scoring the first of his three goals in a thrashing… [+1150 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Closeup Footage of the Big Crash From Last Night’s NASCAR Cup Series Race at Bristol - Essentially Sports
articles.description: Last night, fans finally got the chance to see some short-track racing, at Bristol Motor Speedway after NASCAR returned from the COVID-19 shutdown.

articles.title: 'Upon further internal discussion': Nats reverse minor league pay cut decision - The Athletic
articles.description: Washington cut 40 minor league players, but will restore the monthly stipend for June to $400 for those who remain.
articles.content: When word leaked out Sunday in The Athletic the Nationals would lower the minor-league stipends 25 percent — to $300 per week — for the month of June, members of Washington’s big-league team quickly … [+726 chars]
